BrAPI.R6 0.1.0
  • Reference

    BrAPIClient Class

    BrAPIClient.Rd

    The BrAPIClient class handles the configuration of the BrAPI connection and is a wrapper class around httr2 functionality

    Details

    The BrAPIClient class handles the configuration of the BrAPIClient connection and is a wrapper class around httr2 functionality

    Super class

    BrAPI.R6::BaseBrAPIClient -> BrAPIClient

    Active bindings

    Methods

    Public methods

    • BrAPIClient$clone()

    Inherited methods
    • BrAPI.R6::BaseBrAPIClient$initialize()
    • BrAPI.R6::BaseBrAPIClient$perform_get_request()
    • BrAPI.R6::BaseBrAPIClient$perform_post_request()

    Method clone()

    The objects of this class are cloneable with this method.

    Usage

    BrAPIClient$clone(deep = FALSE)

    Arguments

    deep

    Whether to make a deep clone.

    Examples

    BrAPIClient$new(token = "www.brapiserver.com")
#> Error in initialize(...): unused argument (token = "www.brapiserver.com")
